audit_summary: Performed security simulation and code review. Identified and fixed potential DoS vulnerability and Input Sanitization issue.

fixes_applied.issue: Potential DoS via Resource Exhaustion (Unlimited Array Size)
fixes_applied.fix: Implemented strict limit of 50 items per request for both stocks and crypto.

fixes_applied.issue: Improper Input Sanitization in Crypto URL construction
fixes_applied.fix: Added encodeURIComponent to crypto symbols to prevent Parameter Pollution/Injection.
